divs: Sighting Detailsi just wrote this up and submitted it and i guess i had not filled in my last name and lost my whole description but i saw that someone to the south of me may have seen the same thig so i will take the time and re-enter this (fast) so there will be lots of spelling mistakes i just need to get this out fast while its fresh.... i was setting up me new tellecope to look at mars( almots right above tonight a little to the south when i saw a dim red satellite with my unaided eye. it was moveing faster then a usualy satalight and seemed to be picking up speed, it was heading from south east to west when it changed course it was turning north. my view became obstructed and i called out to my girlfriend and told her quickly what i was seeing, she didnt take me seriously and i figure i was wasteing my tima so i look out again and caught a last glimps of it now moveing north. this all took place in about a min or less.
